data.description: Industrial Scientific is looking for a summer 2026 Software Engineering Intern! The ideal candidate will have the desire and aptitude to work with cutting edge technologies and architectures in a forward-thinking organization that's always pushing boundaries. Our ideal candidate has experience across the stack and a firm understanding of web frameworks, APIs, databases and back-end languages. As a Software Engineering Intern, you would enjoy the challenge of building software features for a product that leads to improvement in safety outcomes. You would be joining a team and organization that embraces open collaboration and teamwork, undertakes agile development, provides opportunities for learning and growth â€“ all the while focused on the mission of eliminating death on the job by 2050.
